articles.content: This week, the market showed some signs of profit-taking, but at the same time, it largely consolidated and traded in a range. The trading range stayed modest at 362 points. The global equities remai… [+3832 chars]

articles.title: Funding and acquisitions in Indian startups this week [09-14 Oct] - Entrackr
articles.description: This week, 26 Indian startups raised about $319 million in funding. This includes nine growth-stage startups and 14 early stage startups.

articles.description: IRFC Share Price Target 2023: ​The company has declared a total dividend of Rs 1,960.28 crore which works out to 30.93 per cent of profit after tax for FY 2022-23.
